title: What is a basement below a sub basement? - Quora

response.answer_text: In NYC a basement below a sub basement is called as sub sub-basement which is actually 3 floor levels down, below the ground level.. Typically the buildings in NYC has a ground floor which normally is the street level.. A basement floor which is 1 floor below the ground floor.. Next lower floor is called sub-basement level, which is another floor below the basement level.. And the sub sub-basement level which is also another floor below the sub-basement level of the building..

A subbasement is a floor or set of floors below the main basement floor. Basements commonly have a small amount of vertical space located above ground; subbasements are therefore entirely underground.
